articles.title: Smith confirmed as Australia's new Test opener - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Matt Renshaw picked as David Warner's replacement, Cameron Green gets the nod to bat at No. 4
articles.content:
Bailey confirmed Smith will open for Australia in Tests. © Getty
Steve Smith has been officially confirmed as Australia's new Test opener by George Bailey, the chairman of selectors. Even though the… [+3010 chars]
